Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class FaithTrack

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.FaithTrack
Direct Known Subclasses:
SoloFaithTrack
public class FaithTrack
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    FaithTrack()
    constructor that should be used for the game sets the marker at 0, sets the points used as tracking at 0, generates the PopesFavorCards
    FaithTrack​(int initialstate)
    constructor used for testing

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void activatePopeSpace​(int zone)
    method used to activate the zone (or discard the card). it doesn't check if the zone is already activated, as it should be done before invoking this method
    int checkPopeSpace()
    method used inside the movement and the predict method checks if a popeSpace is being crossed returns the position of the popeSpace or 0 if none is being crossed
    boolean checkZone​(int index)
    method used to check if we can "activate" or we have to discard the Pope Card after a vatican report is activated
    void CoolPrint()

    PopesFavorCard getThird()  
    void increasePopePoints​(int points)  
    void increasePosition()
    method used as QoL to make more simple to understands what it does inside other methods
    void increasePosition​(int faithPoints)
    override that isn't used anymore.
    void Movement​(int move)
    method used to perform the movement after gaining faith points.
    int MultiPlayerMovement​(int move)
    method that moves the marker on the track, updates the score given by the track and checks if any popespace han been activated, returns the activated space
    boolean[] popeCardsStatus()
    method that is used to update the status inside a PlayerUpdate

    note that the method does NOT signal a difference between discarded and not reached zones, the only difference that is reported is if the card has been acquired or not.
    boolean[] predict​(int move)
    method used to "predict" before making the movement, if a vatican report is being activated with this move. it also checks if it was already active.
    void printstate()
    useful for debug, prints a state of the track

    method used to calculate the total points gained from the faith track

    • FaithTrack

      public FaithTrack()

      constructor used for testing
      Parameters:
      initialstate - the position of the marker at the start could not be 0

      method used as QoL to make more simple to understands what it does inside other methods

    • TotalVictoryPointsFaithTrack

      public int TotalVictoryPointsFaithTrack()
      method used to calculate the total points gained from the faith track
      Returns:
      an int which represents the total points gained (from the PopesFavorCards and from the points on the grid)

    • increasePopePoints

      public void increasePopePoints​(int points)

    • increasePosition

      public void increasePosition​(int faithPoints)
      override that isn't used anymore.
      Parameters:
      faithPoints -

    • checkPopeSpace

      public int checkPopeSpace()
      method used inside the movement and the predict method checks if a popeSpace is being crossed returns the position of the popeSpace or 0 if none is being crossed
      Returns:
      returns the position of the popeSpace or 0 if none is being crossed

    • checkZone

      public boolean checkZone​(int index)
      method used to check if we can "activate" or we have to discard the Pope Card after a vatican report is activated
      Parameters:
      index - specifies what "pope zone" is being checked
      Returns:
      returns true if the markers meets the requirements for unlocking the Pope's favor card, false if it doesn't

    • updateScore

      public int updateScore()
      method that returns the actual victory points reached while the marker is moving
      Returns:
      total points gained from advancing in the faith track, -1 if after the movement the score hasn't changed

    • Movement

      public void Movement​(int move)
      method used to perform the movement after gaining faith points. at the moment it only "activate" the Pope card of the player performing the movement, so it needs to be updated
      Parameters:
      move - specifies how much the faithmarker needs to advance

    • getOnlyTrackPoints

      public int getOnlyTrackPoints()

    • activatePopeSpace

      public void activatePopeSpace​(int zone)
      method used to activate the zone (or discard the card). it doesn't check if the zone is already activated, as it should be done before invoking this method
      Parameters:
      zone - specifies which of the three zones is being activated

    • getFirst

      public PopesFavorCard getFirst()

    • getSecond

      public PopesFavorCard getSecond()

    • getThird

      public PopesFavorCard getThird()

    • setFaithMarker

      public void setFaithMarker​(int faithMarker)

    • predict

      public boolean[] predict​(int move)
      method used to "predict" before making the movement, if a vatican report is being activated with this move. it also checks if it was already active. at the moment it verifies if even two or three zones are being activated at once, which is impossible in the normal game but if an extention to the game is made this section is already covered
      Parameters:
      move - specifies the move the marker is going to make
      Returns:
      a boolean vector of length 3, where true in any of the spaces means that this zone is being activated

    • MultiPlayerMovement

      public int MultiPlayerMovement​(int move)
      method that moves the marker on the track, updates the score given by the track and checks if any popespace han been activated, returns the activated space
      Parameters:
      move - movement made (faith points received)
      Returns:
      vatican report to be activated, zero if none

    • printstate

      public void printstate()
      useful for debug, prints a state of the track

    • CoolPrint

      public void CoolPrint()

    • singlePlayerMovement

      public void singlePlayerMovement​(int move)

    • popeCardsStatus

      public boolean[] popeCardsStatus()
      method that is used to update the status inside a PlayerUpdate

      note that the method does NOT signal a difference between discarded and not reached zones, the only difference that is reported is if the card has been acquired or not.
      Returns:
      a boolean array stating which popeCards have been activated

    • DoIActivateTheZone

      public boolean DoIActivateTheZone​(int zone)
